title: Kakure Otaku no Renai Senryaku
original_name: 隠れオタクの恋愛戦略
sinopse:
A secret otaku boy who doesn't even realize himself that he wants to be found out, and a secret otaku girl who just wants to make friends without outing herself as an otaku: lines cross as these two fall for each other.

(Source: Tokyo Otaku Mode)
